reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of BIOL 201, MICB 202 or (b) BIOT 380.

description: Mechanisms of bacterial pathogenesis including adherence, invasion, intracellular survival, toxins, host defenses and microbial evasion strategies, antibiotics, and vaccines. Introduction to experimental approaches used to study bacterial pathogens.
